snippet: A state police detective who investigated a 2011 Northwest killing spree by two white supremacists is expected to plead guilty to forgery and official misconduct related to the case.
lead_paragraph: A state police detective who investigated a 2011 Northwest killing spree by two white supremacists is expected to plead guilty to forgery and official misconduct related to the case.

headline.main: Oregon: Investigator of Killing Spree Will Plead Guilty to Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Oregon: Investigator of Killing Spree Will Plead Guilty To Misconduct
